ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISPICKVAL(clofor_com_cfs__status__c, "輸入 A/N情報登録済み(A/N Data Registered)"),OR(ISBLANK(clofor_com_cfs__HBL_Number_SEA_AIR__c),ISBLANK(clofor_com_cfs__MBL_Number_SEA_AIR__c),ISBLANK(clofor_com_cfs__Item__c),ISBLANK(clofor_com_cfs__weight__c),ISBLANK(clofor_com_cfs__LoadLocation__c),ISBLANK(clofor_com_cfs__carton__c)), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: H B/L番号及びM B/L番号、商品、重量、個数、デバン場所を必ず入れてください。 Please enter the H B/L NO,M B/L NO, Item, Gross Weight, Load Location, Quantity.
